website_summaries.verdict: This kit includes multiple test strips and lab testing for 1 price.
pros: Each kit includes testing supplies for 3 surfaces to test for all surface mold types
Price includes lab fees with a detailed report
You can also call and ask any questions about the report
cons: Does not test for airborne mold

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great test kit and lab service.
customer_reviews.text: As a professional home inspector I was recommended by another to try this test kit and I have found my new go to lab. The Seeml kit allows you to collect and test at least 3 samples where many others only include one and there are hidden additional fees. I received the results promptly and they provided me with more information about the results and type of mold then previous labs I've used. They also called to see if I had any questions or needed any additional assistance. This kit is highly recommended not only for the price but for the quality of the testing and followup assistance from the lab.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great result from an accredited lab
customer_reviews.text: Ian very happy with the promptness in which I received the test kit..The kit itself is easy to use, and the directions were clear. After i sent samples back to the company, I received the results same day via email. I would definitely use this company again if the need. I was happy to know seeml is an AIHA accredited mold lab. I would recommend this product. I am going to buy the asbestos kit from them.
customer_reviews.author: Zineb Fannan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. FAST processing and results! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat skeptical but ordered based on the fact that they are accredited. Easy to use kit, 3 tests included and you can buy more if needed. Easy instructions. I was happy with the results and even happier that they called to let me know they processed my samples and if I had any questions please call. I highly recommend this kit! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Magoo356

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They found toxic black mold in my daughters room. Since we locked it until our insurance can fix it, my daughter hasn’t been to the ER for weeks. I am so happy to know what was causing it so I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service with Nice Detailed Report
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this specific test kit. Instructions are clear and everything is very simple to use. I can appreciate that because I used to sample groundwater and stormwater, working continually with analytical labs. This company communicates effectively, will answer any questions you have, and provide very detailed results. A kit like this should be $100+! Thanks SEEML Labs!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was an expensive test for the information given. They could not even identify the specific mold spores that were most abundant in the area tested. It basically just confirmed it was present, which is useless. If you're concerned about mold exposure just bite the bullet and pay to get a HRTSMI 2 or ERMI test these give a rating and concentrations of specific mold spores.
customer_reviews.author: cellar07

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great staff
customer_reviews.text: The kit was easy to use and the staff was very attentive to results. I highly recommend this if you suspect you have mold. They called me the day they received it and called back the same day with the results. They went over the results thoroughly and said I could call back with any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service With this Kit= A+++
customer_reviews.text: This company is excellent and very professional. They emailed and personally discussed my lab results, which I found to be very helpful. I plan to use them again when I need more tests and highly recommend if you'd like labs results and would like to discuss. This is the best one I've found so far for personal home tests. Thank you, SEEML labs for handling my tests samples so quickly. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kjoy

customer_reviews.title: Only for surface testing
customer_reviews.text: This product is for surface testing only, and the application is not clearly stated. I returned this product because I need a test kit for air and not for surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cost effective mold test kit
customer_reviews.text: This mold test is excellent and has several methods to collect samples and the company includes several samples in the cost. The lab sent the results by email in a timely manner was very helpful and gave a good detailed explanation. The company also offered excellent customer service. Highly recommended. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: User 2050

customer_reviews.title: Professional Company
customer_reviews.text: Got my kit just as promised. Took my samples, a little difficult but I managed. Kind of tough in my particular situation to decide where exactly to test. Followed instruction to return. They got it this morning, called to let me know my results would be sent via email within minutes. Read my report, had a question. An analyst was immediately available to answer my questions. My suspicions are confirmed, further investigation is in my future. I would recommend this company. (I can't speak to the accuracy at this time)
customer_reviews.author: Dotty Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great, very happy
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!!! I have ordered 2 more. It is telling me much more about my current remediation, and what is still growing and what IS mold. I definitely recommend them. The lab is very nice and professional. Thank you!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! They reviewed the test quickly and communicated the results! Customer service was very helpful when we called with questions . Excellent value! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: fergy

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually like or believe 5 star ratings, but these guys did me a solid
customer_reviews.text: Great work, you helped solve a mystery in my home guys!
customer_reviews.author: Scuba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well with a fast response by the company on results.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Postage not included.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy that it doesn’t contain a prepaid mailing label. Having to go stand in line at the post office makes the purchase not worth it terms of my time along with the money spent on the test. I could have hired someone to come to my home and do the tests for the same time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Krepism

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy, Fast
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to get the samples needed and were fast getting me the results. If I need to do further tests I will definitely use this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: ABreg2

customer_reviews.title: Have to try this lab!
customer_reviews.text: This product helped save us hundreds of dollars! We were afraid we had toxic black mold in our old home and decided to give this lab a try for half the price of a local professionsal. It took no time to get our results back. The lab was very helpful in answering questions I had about the results! I would highly recommend this lab to others!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRay

customer_reviews.title: Best with professionalism
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lab out there. They call you before they send out the results and to come your email. They are the best and this is my first time using these people.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Work excellent for cold or hot drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this tumbler. Keeps my drinks cold all day. The tumbler handles are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Delores Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Got this to test some spots in our bathroom. The kit was very easy to use and took only a few minutes. Recieved a detail report on each sample. Was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Sullysgirl

customer_reviews.title: If you need a mold test and fast results...buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, the results were easy to read when they sent them to me. The instructions were also easy, and the mailing process were easy as well. Everything was a breeze and I’m glad I made this purchase! Thank you l!
customer_reviews.author: foustswife

customer_reviews.title: The kit worked as expected. The lab followed up ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit worked as expected. The lab followed up results with a phone call, and couldn't have been more knowledgeable and courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and using it was super easy. I got quick results and any questions I had were answered. I would definitely buy again and would recommend it to anyone who needs to know about mold in there home and are on a budget to use this.
customer_reviews.author: CLMathews

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Was ready to get going...and NO INSTRUCTIONS were included! Had to return...
customer_reviews.author: k eckols

customer_reviews.title: We got scammed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible results. We had vidible mold, I taped tested and the results came back as “no mold”. This was Waste of money. I’ll go with the non verified lab next time. They were way better for $10 less. Turns out after a second test with another lab, it was toxic mold.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Quickly delivered results, easy collection process, good value for price and testing, I'm unsure the accuracy because I haven't double checked with a different company for results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!. I love the customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mold detection kit ever. Great and understandable instructions Extremely easy to use. Very quick response from SEEML in an email and a call from SEEML to explain each and every finding. I am so impressed with their professionalism. My contractor has decided to use this lab exclusively for mold detection and has already written procedures and work instructions using their kits as the basis. Thank you SEEML.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Good value compared to other test kits. Customer service was excellent, patient, knowledgable, and very helpful. i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raw for Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got the results back in less than a week. Very easy to understand the results.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Logan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used this to test an old workshop which had water damage. Easy to use, mailed it in and had an answer just a couple of days later.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Musselman

customer_reviews.title: windows need replacement
customer_reviews.text: found the worst mold was in the windows, double wide trailer yuk
customer_reviews.author: Carol Field

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this test was easy, simple, affordable and anonymous. The instructions were clear, the lab tests were free, the only additional expense was the postage. I will definitely be recommending them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Heimer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast lab results
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very fast lab results. They pay for postage and even called me with the results along with email. Will use this again
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: The utmost importance.
customer_reviews.text: It was only for surface mold - not airborne mold.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, with free, quick results!
customer_reviews.text: This whole home test kit, for mold and other toxins, was very easy to use. Many companies charge to read your results... But this one is free. The results come very quickly, via email...I think it was less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Crisci

product_meta.title: DIY Mold Test Kit (3 Tests) Expert Consultation and AIHA-LAP, LLC Accredited Lab Analysis Included
product_meta.description: We are a professional AIHA-LAP, LLC accredited Lab that specializes in Mold analysis. It is easy, with our help you collect the surface samples yourself, and send to the lab. No additional fees are necessary. Lab provides a confidential report via your email address. Free consultation for helping you understand your report. Detailed instructions are provided. This is a surface only kit and is not for air testing. No need to purchase multiple kits , You can for a additional fee add on more samples if you have more than 3 samples needed to be sent , just follow the easy instruction for extra samples inside the box,
feature_bullets: No additional fees are required. Lab Fees Included. .Same day turn around time on the results from the day we receive your sample.
Our test kit is for up to 3 separate samples.
We test for all mold types for one low price

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
